Content.Text:
<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, are you the new farmer who just moved in?
I'm Giorgio. Nice to meet you.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. How are you
doing?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. How do I look
today?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <MYNAME>. Hmm, you look a
bit sleepy... You should get more rest. It's good
for your skin, you know.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hi, <MYNAME>. How are you?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hello, <MYNAME>. How are you doing?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey there. Don't push yourself too hard, all
right?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. How's your work
coming along?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hello! Good evening. ...You look like you're ready
for bed. Are you well to be out and about?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening, <MYNAME>. Staying up late is
bad for your health, you know. It's dreadful for
your skin. Take care of yourself.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Gorgeous today, isn't it? Maybe I should take a
walk.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You and I might not care for the weather today,
but the flowers seem to like it.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, why does it have to be so hot...? I'd better
put on some lotion before I get sunburned.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
To people, this weather's an annoyance, but to
flowers, it's a blessing. Look how happy they
are. They're stretching their stems.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ah, isn't it lovely out today? Days like this make
me want to take a nice long stroll.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah, these long autumn rains... The best thing to
do on a day like this is stay home and read a
good book.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This fresh air makes me feel so good.
<PAGE>
Yes, on days like this, biting cold weather can
actually make me feel comfortable.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
So it's snow today, is it? Not too much of it, I
hope.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my, you came to see me in this weather?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...I'm flattered. I can't offer you much besides
my hospitality, but please, stay as long as you
like.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my, you came see me in this weather?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Wonderful timing! I was just getting bored.
Please, relax and warm yourself up.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, <MYNAME>, if you're seeing
someone, I'd like to meet them.
<PAGE>
...And when are you two getting married?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Raeger's cooking is always impressive. I come
here at least three times a week.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This restaurant is one of the reasons I live here,
you know.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like chatting with Marian.
<PAGE>
We're both students of beauty, so we always
compare notes and share tips.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Klaus' perfumes are incomparable. I love to fill
my room with their aroma.
<PAGE>
There's no one else with a better sense for
scents.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I came here to shop today, but I can't find
anything that suits my aesthetic tastes.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There're many interesting things here. I'm sure
Mistel has a very keen sense of art.
<PAGE>
If you're interested in antiques, you should buy
something.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I feel a strange sort of presence when I walk
around here. Is it just me?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I love the smell of the woods around here. The
air is so fresh!

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is my favorite place to walk. It's so nice to
take a walk in the woods and listen to the songs
of the birds.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I sometimes see people come to fish in the river.
I wonder what they catch out here.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Is this where you live, around here? The air is so
fresh and invigorating. It's such a nice place,
isn't it?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Stop by my place whenever you're in the area.
We'll swap a few beauty tips.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Phew! This walk is certainly breathtaking, in
more ways than one.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's interesting how crops can grow on a slope,
don't you think?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Eda's using the field on that side. ...It must be
hard for her to come out all this way.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This field's good for growing flowers. And if you
have both flowers and bees, you can harvest
honey, too.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Flowers love the soil around here.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How do you like my flower gardens? I grow
roses, except in winter. They bloom beautifully
in this soil.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The field here is well irrigated and has plenty of
sunlight. It's perfect for growing vegetables.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I suppose I could build some flower gardens
here, if I set my mind to it.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is Fritz's field, isn't it? Well, it's a decent
enough field, I suppose. I didn't know he was
working this hard.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I don't much care for working with paddies. It's
just not in my nature to wallow in the mud.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is the nearest field to my house. I drew
water from the river and made paddies. Not that
paddies are my favorite, by any stretch.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear Elise shares my distaste for paddies.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When I go out, I get sunburned easily. I always
have to remember my lotion.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I go for walks whenever I can. It keeps me
healthy, not to mention good looking.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Farming is hard work, isn't it? But when I see
my flowers bloom, all that exhaustion just melts
away.
<PAGE>
Nothing makes me happier than the colors of my
garden.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you growing any flowers?
<PAGE>
When flowers bloom, don't pick them right
away. Take some time to enjoy their beauty first.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What makes a farm grow is love. If you love your
livestock and your crops, they'll love you back.
<PAGE>
Of course, that's easier said than done
sometimes. Just take things day by day.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's been a long time since I moved here. This
town is full of warm, friendly people...some
quirkier than others.
<PAGE>
Marian, for example. A bit of an oddball to look
at, perhaps, but the two of us have always
clicked.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Building the world's most beautiful farm is quite
a task. I can't always control the colors of the
flowers.
<PAGE>
But if I can pull it off, then this beautiful farm is
where I'll marry my one-and-only.
<PAGE>
I'm engaged to a model, you see. A jet-setter,
always flying around everywhere. Once we're
married, the world will be our oyster.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Have you ever heard of a magazine called
"Farmer's Monthly?"
<PAGE>
They keep putting me on the cover, as the "new
face of farming." But I don't think I've earned that
title yet.
<PAGE>
So recently, I've been turning down their offers
while I focus on my work.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <MYNAME>. How long has it been since
you moved here...?
<PAGE>
You didn't make much of an impression on me
at first, but you've become ever more a part of
my daily life.
<PAGE>
You've had quite an influence on me, actually.
Brilliantly so.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>Wow, you're giving me this
<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>? It's my favorite...
Thank you so much!

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>Hm, you're giving me this, are you? I love it!
<PAGE>
Thank you very much!

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, you're giving me this? You're well-
acquainted with my tastes, I see. Thank you.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hmm...? Oh, is this for me? Thanks!

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm, for me...? Sure, why not? Thanks.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>Oh, you want to give me this...? I s-suppose I
can take it off your hands...

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>I should tell you I hate <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE>
more than anything.
<PAGE>
But since it's a gift, here, I'll take it.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>Wow, look at that golden shine! Thank you for
such a rare gift.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, it's quite flashy, isn't it? Thank you. But you
don't have to be so kind.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This looks gorgeous. Of course, it's what's inside
that counts... Sure, I'll take it.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)
Let's not give him a present right now.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm sorry, but I'm not in the mood for gifts right
now. Next time, perhaps.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...You're giving me another present?
<PAGE>
I'm sorry, I have to decline. I'd feel guilty
accepting so much from you.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>This is a birthday present? Oh, it is my birthday,
isn't it? You remembered!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Well now, <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE> is my
favorite. Thank you! You've truly made my day.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>Hm, you're giving me this, are you? I love it.
Thank you so much!
<PAGE>
...What? This is a birthday present?! Oh,
right...it's my birthday today, isn't it? I'm glad
you remembered.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well now, a birthday present for me, is it? You're
well-acquainted with my tastes. Thank you very
much!

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, is this a birthday present for me? Thank you
very much.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? Is this for me...? A birthday present... All
right, well...I'll take it, then. Thank you.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>...What? THIS is a birthday present?! Are you
sure? A-all right, I'll take it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>At least you remembered my birthday. Thank
you for that.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>I should tell you that I hate
<BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE> with a vengeance.
<PAGE>
...But, seeing as it's a birthday present from you,
I'll take it. Thank you.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>My, how twinkly! And this is a birthday present
for me?
<PAGE>
How did you know what I like? This is a rare gift
you're giving me. Thank you.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, it's quite flashy, isn't it? Thank you.
<PAGE>
Although you don't have to be this nice, even if
it is my birthday.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This looks gorgeous, but it's the inside that really
matters.
<PAGE>
Of course, since it is a birthday present from
you, I'll take it.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What an adorable little rabbit. With its fur, I
could... Oh, nothing. Never mind.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How adorable. With its fur, I could... Oh,
nothing. Never mind.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, it's an ermine. Look at that funny little face.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I don't think it likes to be held. You should let it
go.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a strange-looking rabbit. That fur, so
smooth...

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now that's quite cute.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That is one healthy-looking chicken.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, what a cute dog. Are you keeping it?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a cute dog, but it's a bit...rotund, don't
you think?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
That's a very sharp-looking dog.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can see that dog's got a good heart, but don't
let it get too overweight.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a cute cat. I like its face.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a cute cat, but it's a little too well-fed.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That is a well-groomed cat. Such nice, smooth
fur.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That cat has a very nice coat, but it's a bit
rotund.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>Ahh, what a beautiful flower. Perfectly suited for
me, don't you think?
<PAGE>
And quite fitting for the Flower Fair as well.
Thank you.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A blue feather, is it...? I'm sorry, but I'm already
spoken for.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A ring...?! I'm sorry, but I'm already spoken for.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My, what beautiful wrapping. Well, shall we see
what's inside?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A gift for me? Now I'm most curious.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you know what day it is?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>...Happy birthday! Here, I've brought you a gift.
Please, accept it.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today's your birthday, isn't it? Have a marvelous
birthday!

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hello, <MYNAME>. It feels like we haven't
spoken in ages. Well, that's fine, as long as
you've been all right.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
(no translation)

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, what fine clothes you have on. Practical and
colorful as well. Though you really should
consider adding an accent of some kind.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a perfect outfit for a hard day's work. It's
functional, and the color's sharp as well. A fine
look for you.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A foreign merchant's outfit, is it? I saw
something similar once in Sakura Country. The
color is very chic.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a fine vest. The yellow-checkered design
is very fashionable.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a fine coat. Very appealing design, and
the tie matches it perfectly.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What an adorable raincoat. The color's so bright,
and those boots -- they're a perfect fit.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You look so stylish today. That kind of outfit can
be difficult to wear, but you certainly wear it
with panache.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Going all blue today, I see. I like it. It goes well
with your farm.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A blue down jacket, I see. It must be nice and
snug, no?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I do like the color of that raincoat. It goes along
well with those boots.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like the color of that sleeveless shirt. Dark
yellow simply radiates maturity.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Where did you get that coat? It's impossible to
find that style around here...
<PAGE>
...It must have come from one of the snowy
countries, yes? It sits exquisitely well on those
shoulders of yours.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That down jacket looks warm. It goes well with
your trousers, too.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That outfit of yours is so exotic. Pulling off
foreign fashion is no easy feat, but you manage
it brilliantly.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a very nice sweater. You look good in
yellow.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, now aren't we cute today? You look
amazing in that.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, a top hat, yes? It looks very classy on you.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When flowers bloom in all their beauty, my

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Animals are like family. If you raise them with

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_PATI>

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Whenever you're down in the dumps, just look at
something yellow. That's what cheers me up!

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_ROSE_R>Oh...how beautiful... Why, that golden color is
almost as flawless as I am.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Yes, you know what the world needs. Light,
flash, color! You have just the right idea.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You've got a knack for decoration. Have you ever
considered making a career out of it? I can
introduce you to magazine people, if you like.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You must have very keen senses to care so
much for roses. They look and smell...hmm,
perfect. They should stay here forever.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Well now, this is new. So we can enjoy your
decorations even at night... How creative!

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I visited Silk Country's store the other day. There
were many things on sale there.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear good-quality cloth is sold in Cabin
Country. I'll have to buy some soon...

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear the rice from Sakura Country is simply
divine. Someday, I should make risotto with it...

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I saw Wheat Country's store in the Trade Depot
the other day. My, but that place is busy!

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I visited Rose Country's store the other day, and
for some reason, I felt a kind of kinship with the
merchant. It must be fate.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The fruit of Tropical Country is quite delicious.
You simply must try it!

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear Ice Country's store sells a penguin
costume. Why don't you buy one? I'm sure you'd
look fabulous in it.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well now, you seem to be set on this Conquest
business.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Your crops are growing in every field this town
owns. Clearly, you are the far superior
Conqueror.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, it seems someone new has moved into
town. The more the merrier, yes?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Our little town's grown world-famous, hasn't it?
I see people come from all over these days.
<PAGE>
You might have heard this from Rose Country's
merchant, but if you're interested in doing
business with more countries...
<PAGE>
I recommend you pay attention to not only how
much you ship, but also what kinds of items
you ship.
<PAGE>
For example, if a country is interested in items
like wallpapers, decorations, garden items and
roads...
<PAGE>
Then if you ship lots of those items, they might
take an interest in our town and open trade
relations.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town is so much busier now than it was
when I first moved here.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town does get a bit lonely sometimes, with
so few people, but that does leave more room to
grow flowers.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Little by little, this town has been growing since
I first moved in.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We're a small backwater town for now, but if we
farmers do our best, we'll draw all kinds of
people in.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I never imagined our tiny little town could have
so much hustle and bustle! You helped make
this happen, you know, with your hard work.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here you are -- your allowance for the day. Use
it well.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That yellow bench looks quite inviting...

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The closer I look at this golden bench, the
brighter it shines.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'd love to decorate my garden with a wagon just
like this one.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I should have a garden chair like this. It would
be so practical for outdoor parties...

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I should have a parasol like this. It would be so

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ice lamps are so beautiful. I love their clarity.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My favorite color is yellow, so I certainly like that
tree.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My favorite color is yellow, so I certainly like that
pole.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yellow is my lucky color. That's why I like that
gate.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That tiny tower is intriguing, to say the least.
What is it for, I wonder?

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, what's this ride all about? I'd love to find out
for myself, but it might be a bit too small for
me...

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What I like about sunflowers is those big, yellow
petals.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's very difficult to grow blue roses.
<PAGE>
That's because blue roses don't exist in nature,
per se.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What I like about sunflowers is those big, yellow
petals.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's very difficult to grow blue roses.
<PAGE>

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Flowers in hanging pots have a special beauty all

<PAGE>
Especially when hung from terraces and

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
More flower baskets all around town would

Especially yellow flower baskets.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A proper topiary should consist of two spheres.
A one-sphere topiary looks odd somehow.

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, a topiary of a mammoth. Quite well made, I

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you put flowers in that tricycle pot and display

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>

<FACE_GEORGES><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
